answers.answer: This is nothing to worry about, however, you can always consult your physician and have your blood sugar level checked for peace of mind.

You mentioned that diabetes runs in your family - don't get alarmed, but it may be a possible sign of diabetes.  However, sweet tears can also be the result of many other things.  I would advise you to see about being tested for diabetes - even if it's just to rule it out.  Talk with your doctor about it.

question: I noticed that my tears a very sweet. Has never been like that before.  Diabetes runs in my family so I'm concerned. Is this something I should worry about?
title: Sweet tears
